snippet: Li Na, the defending women’s singles champion, lost to the doubles specialist Yaroslava Shvedova of Kazakhstan, and Maria Sharapova was pushed to three sets before advancing to the quarterfinals at the French Open.
abstract: Li Na, the defending women’s singles champion, loses to the doubles specialist Yaroslava Shvedova in the quarterfinals at the French Open; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Li Na, the defending women’s singles champion, lost to the doubles specialist Yaroslava Shvedova of Kazakhstan, and Maria Sharapova was pushed to three sets before advancing to the quarterfinals at the French Open.

headline.seo: 2012 French Open: Li Na Loses and Sharapova Struggles as Surprises Continue
headline.main: More Jolts as Li Loses and Sharapova Labors
headline.print_headline: More Jolts as Li Loses And Sharapova Labors
